message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, even more so than my initial asking price.
I appreciate your offer, but I think it's a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I believe it's a great deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I understand your concerns about the product's value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,500 for the product. I think it's a fair compromise.
